TopicTitle: Able, Baker, and introducing Charlie, the White Monkey Kitchenware craft flies again.

Articles.Content:
There's one parts pack I really miss from the old days, the White Monkey Kitchenware and SpaceParts Factory was never updated, and Sarkun has long since left the community, with his work effectively being 'all rights reserved' it has faded into obscurity.

But 1.0 gave me the parts to remake it...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

[Craft on Dropbox] [Craft on Pastebin]

The Able has a lot of stability, you'll need to hold the S key a lot to turn (Able starts facing East), and the upper stage will circularise you and get you to the Mun or Minmus orbit.

Baker is tight on fuel so be careful, you don't have much hover time if you want to make orbit again, though there is an RCS reserve.

Charlie is really just for coming home, he has no probe core so you might want to EVA across, it's up to you, Baker alone isn't capable of a landing and return so an additional craft was needed.

The names Able, Baker and Charlie come from the old US phonetic alphabet before alpha, beta etc, so it made sense to name the CSM Charlie as well.

Have fun

Edited May 30, 2015 by sal_vager
